[DOMINIC]36-dominic

[[My]0-i little fighter]657-my little fighter had been battling a silent war the whole time [I]0-i ’d known [her]657-my little fighter without ever giving [me]0-i a heads - up . [She]657-my little fighter was strong . So strong that [I]0-i was sure [she]657-my little fighter ’d be able to move a mountain if [I]0-i goaded [her]657-my little fighter into it .
